name: Aztec God Of Chickens
description:
It is game in which you have to destroy angry and bad God by overfeeding him chickens.

Created by Crazy Hu-Man Chickens:

Łukasz Sawicki

Bartek Dworzo Dworzyński

David Urbaniak

Daniel Sobczak

To play Red character you have to use H and J and k =K and to shoot accordingly J- left shooting, L right shooting, k down shooting, o up shooting.

To play Red character yo have to use left button and trigger for shoot UP,  left trigger to shoot up, right, right button to shoot left and right butto and to shoot right you have to use right trigger, for jumping you have to push A button.

To reset game you have to push R on komputer keyboard. To exit game you have to push ctrl + F4.
